mapper.sql: ID, OMS_ID, CER_ID, NAME, RF_B0000, ZJLX, ZJHM, GET_CAUSE, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into oms_cer_admintor_get_apply (ID, OMS_ID, CER_ID, NAME, RF_B0000, ZJLX, ZJHM, GET_CAUSE, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into oms_cer_admintor_get_apply
ID,
OMS_ID,
CER_ID,
NAME,
RF_B0000,
ZJLX,
ZJHM,
GET_CAUSE,
OPERATOR,
OPERATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update oms_cer_admintor_get_apply
OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_CAUSE = #{getCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oms_cer_admintor_get_apply set OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_CAUSE = #{getCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id omsId, CONCAT(a.surname, a.name) name, a.sex, a.BIRTH_DATE birthDate, a.INCUMBENCY_STATUS incumbencyStatus, ( SELECT item.item_name FROM sys_dict_item item WHERE item.dict_code = 'ZZZT' AND a.incumbency_status= item.item_code ) incumbencyStatusName, a.rf_b0000 rfB0000, a.WORK_UNIT workUnit, a.post, b.id cerId, b.zjlx, (SELECT item.item_name FROM sys_dict_item item WHERE item.dict_code = 'ZJLX' AND b.zjlx= item.item_code) zjlxName, b.zjhm FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo a INNER JOIN cf_certificate b ON a.id = b.oms_id WHERE a.id = #{omsId} AND b.save_status = '0' AND b.card_status != '7'
